timeline.message: Improve warehouse assignment for multi warehouses

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              "com.minecolonies.coremod.colonysizechange": "%d chunks were claimed by %s centered around itself.",
          
          
            
              "com.minecolonies.coremod.colonysizechange": "%d chunks were claimed for your colony centered around %s.",
timeline.author: ravenbuilder934
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -870,7 +870,7 @@
   "com.minecolonies.coremod.leavingcolony": "Farewell, you're leaving %s's colony.",
   "com.minecolonies.coremod.enteringcolonynotify": "Beware, %s just entered %s.",
   "com.minecolonies.coremod.leavingcolonynotify": "Farewell, %s has just left %s.",
-  "com.minecolonies.coremod.colonysizechange": "%d chunks around %s have been claimed for your colony.",
+  "com.minecolonies.coremod.colonysizechange": "%d chunks were claimed by %s centered around itself.",

replies.bodyText: then there is no comma between the two parts of th esentence
replies.author: Raycoms

timeline.bodyText: It seems like we're converting to Vector3d in a lot of cases. Should we add a getVec3d to buildingworker?
timeline.author: Mekle001

replies.bodyText: Hmm, would be an overkill, since there is a new Vec3d(blockpos) constructor as well
replies.author: Raycoms
